start.comment: Initial state. Only used for post-visual

active_0.comment: Unproductive current state (no progress, but not failure). Only used for post-visual

last.comment: Last active state before episode end.Only used for post-visual

goal_1.comment: Correct goal state (agent successfully identifies goal)

goal_0.comment: Incorrect goal state (agent misidentifies goal). Only used for post-visual
